name: Donut Arena
description:
Donut Arena is an action arena game with a planning phase before each round. Change arenas wisely, earn items by hyping the crowd, control the king's mood to avoid being punished and conquer underwears to become more powerful and reach higher scores.

Gameplay Features

  • Complex mechanics with lots of possibilities: 15 weapons, 4 helmets, 10 donuts and 7 underwears. Each item with a unique function.
  • Donut effects: carry 2 weapons at once, disarm enemies, regenerate items after broken, transform any item into another type and much more.
  • Conquer underwears while you progress to become more powerful. But remember: you have to tear your underwear before changing it!
  • Organic systems: no numerical stats to compare. Deal with the king's reaction and adapt your build to the current match situation.
  • Online leaderboard to compare yourself with friends and other players.
  • Full controller support.
